WorkItem.Description:
When trying to start the program I get an error which says the following:
 
-------------------------------------------
Rawr: Loading, Please Wait
 
Unhandled exception has occurred in a component in your application.
If you click continue, the application will ignore this error and attempt to continue.
 
Font 'Arial Narrow' does not support style 'Regular'.
-------------------------------------------
 
That's the first error window. After that I obviously click continue. But then another error message opens, stating:
 
-------------------------------------------
Rawr Error
 
Rawr encountered a serious error. Please copy (CTRL+C) and paste this into an e-mail to cnervig@hotmail.com. Thanks!
 
Font 'Verdana' does not support the style 'Regular'.
 
at System.Drawing.Font.CreateNativeFont()
at System.Drawing.Font.Initialize(FontFamily family, Single emSize, FontStyle style, GraphicsUnit unit, Byte gdiCharSet, Boolean gdiVerticalFont)
at System.Drawing.Font.Initialize(String familyName, Single emSize, FontStyle style, GraphicsUnit unit, Byte gdiCharSet, Boolean gdiVerticalFont)
at System.Drawing.Font..ctor(String familyName, Single emSize, FontStyle style, GraphicsUnit unit, Byte gdiCharSet)
at Rawr.ComparisonGraph.InitializeComponent()
at Rawr.ComparisonGraph..ctor()
at Rawr.ItemComparison.InitializeComponent()
at Rawr.ItemComparison..ctor()
at Rawr.FormMain.InitializeComponent()
at Rawr.FormMain..ctor()
at Rawr.Program.Main()
------------------------------------------
 
After that I can only click OK and the program terminates.

Comments.Message: That means you have a corrupt Verdana font. Try getting a copy from a friend.
Worked like a charm, thank you!
